DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine compare glycaemic index value response parameter 6 food product 3 laboratory .
DOC.brief_title: Determination Glycaemic Index Insulinaemic Index Values 6 Food Products 3 Separate Research Centers
DOC.detailed_description: This study perform 3 center 15 subject recruit center .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Aged 1835 year inclusive . 2 . Nonsmoker . 3 . BMI 19.025.0 kg/m2 inclusive . 4 . Healthy subject : Fasting plasma glucose < 5,6 mM ( ADA criteria,2011 ) Insulin resistance index base homeostasis model assessment ( HOMAIR ) < 1.70 Fasting lipid : triglyceride < 1.70mmol/L , LDLcholesterol < 5.00 mmol/L HDLcholesterol > 1.03mmol/L male > 1.29mmol/L female ( IDF criterion metabolic syndrome , 2006 ) GammaGT , AST ALT < 1.5 time upper limit normal ( ULN ) Complete blood count : Normal full blood count accord investigator Systolic blood pressure < 130 mmHg Diastolic blood pressure < 85 mmHg Resting heart rate 5090 beat per minute ( 3 minute rest ) . 5 . Stable dietary habit ; normal eating pattern ; history eat disorder strict dieting . 6 . Moderate level physical activity ( basic daily activity high level physical activity ( regular physical activity least 3 time per week ) ) 7 . Able fast least 10 hour night test session . 8 . Able refrain eat legume drink alcohol day test session . 9 . Subject cover social security cover similar system 10 . Subject take treatment anorexia , weight loss , form treatment likely interfere metabolism dietary habit 11 . Subject give write consent take part study 1 . Following restrictive specific diet . 2 . Suffering inflammatory metabolic diseases 3 . Suffering mental illness . 4 . Suffering food allergy hypersensitivity ( wheat , milk , egg , nut , etc ) . 5 . Taking regular prescription medication time inclusion interfere carbohydrate metabolism ( except regular oral contraception medication , thyroid replacement therapy ) 6 . Female pregnant ( positive test result ) , lactate , plan pregnancy use acceptable contraceptive . 7 . Subject take part another clinical trial within last week . 8 . Subject currently take part another clinical trial exclusion period another clinical trial . 9 . Subject undergoing general anaesthesia month prior inclusion . 10 . Subject situation investigator 's opinion could interfere optimal participation present study could constitute special risk subject .
